name: first-backend-example
description: Helsinki university course firts backen example

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../../part2/notes && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../part3/notes-backend
scripts.build:full: sh -c 'npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m "uibuild $(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" && git push'

author: Alexander Hernandez
